entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 01:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 50 near Haro Strait in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
